definitions.definition: Ellipsis of noun substantive or substantive noun , a noun or a group of words (a noun phrase ) that act as a noun (in a sentence ) .
Part of a text that carries the meaning , such as words and their ordering .

main_definition: ( grammar ) Ellipsis of noun substantive or substantive noun , a noun or a group of words (a noun phrase ) that act as a noun (in a sentence ) . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: Part of a text that carries the meaning , such as words and their ordering .
